item.title: Command That Teleports And Goes A Height
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“JaydenD12, post:3, topic:345691”][quote author=The Soul link=topic=442075.msg3246787#msg3246787 date=1277434400]

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(String)) { toX = absX; toY = absY; heightLevel += 1; }
[/quote]

Bad idea, you could keep using the command to advance height levels.

heightLevel = 1; [/quote]

He said he wanted it to go one level higher when using the command, so that’s what I did.

Read full topic

item.title: Command That Teleports And Goes A Height
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

Umm…I want to do this:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“newhome”)){
toX = xxxx;
toY = yyyy;
sM(“Welcome to the New Home! Still working on!”);
}

How do I do that but make it go one height higher? Thanks.
